channel.title: PI - Adding commands?
channel.description:
Hi peoplee.
Since I have been working on a PI server, I am trying to find out how to add commands. Iv'e tried multiple commands from tutorials; For example the ::bank command, but it just isn't working.
Code I'm using below:
[code=javascript]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && playerRights >= 1) { openUpBank(); } [/code]
Now, I have studied that certain codes don't work for servers like PI's Delta's and so on...
If anyone can show me the basic's of PI commands I'd appreciate that very much!
And also where the commands in PI's are located in. Iv'e checked in Client.java but ::item isn't there...yet ::item works in-game.
The only things Iv'e found in client.java were ::vote, ::fpson, and ::dataon etc.
Thanks. :cool:

item.title: PI - Adding commands?
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

DannyIsSoPro:

Thanks Smokin, I see how the commands are layed out now, tyvm

Yup, no problem.

Read full topic

item.title: PI - Adding commands?
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

[quote=“iz3 legend, post:5, topic:390660”]well for tele commands i would find one that was like the one i wanted then copy and paste it so its pre-written then just edit the cords, teleport message, and so on but i think urs would look something like this

blablabla commands blalalalal
{
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“bank”) && playerRights >= 1) {openUpBank();}
}
{other comamnds here then so on[/quote]
Woah, thats WAY off.

Read full topic

item.title: PI - Adding commands?
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("bank") && c.playerRights >= 1) { c.getPA().openUpBank(); } }
This is how you would make a ::bank command for Project Insanity, It’s different from delta.
Take some time looking through the code, and getting used to the packaging of it, before you start adding content, it can take some time to get used to.

Read full topic

item.title: PI - Adding commands?
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Thanks, I found the commands that are in-game but the set up of them look kinda hard to deal with

item.title: PI - Adding commands?
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

go to src/server/model/player/packets then scroll down to commands and open that up post ur command in that instead of client.java you might have to mess around with the positioning a bit though.

Read full topic
